testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type "M"............................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter "random" email "test@example.com" field......................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test938@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "test938@example.com" and "Wrong P@ssw0rd"...passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: Change Currency
testcase.system-out: When user change currency to "Euro".........................................passed Then all shown products should contain the "€" sign.........................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user can use search feature
testcase.name: User Search By Name
testcase.system-out: When user write "book" in the Search Bar....................................passed And clicks On Search Button.................................................passed Then user is directed to search results page................................passed And search page shows relevant results......................................passed And results contains "book".................................................passed

testcase.name: user select Random Category
testcase.system-out: When User Selects a random Category.........................................passed And Check if it has SubCategories...........................................passed And User click on the selected Category or random SubCategory...............passed Then new page title contains the name of the selected Category or SubCategory.passed

testcase.classname: F06_HomeSliders | user can select all HomeSliders
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Page Is Wrong expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
When user Clicks on Slider number 1.........................................passed Then new page is opened with expected url "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020".failed
